post.body: ...stack-em High Vs Sell-em High I think anyway (like I know what i'm talking about?!)
M$ are Asda/Walmart whilst Apple are Harrod's/Macey's (not completely but only dip a little into each others customer base)....
Thats allowed :-)
see some(small)advantages to apple products but ultimately price & cheap parts/addons wins-Apple is (still) mostly niche market
